sentences.sContent: Wonderful, marvelous. Police always are servants of upper caste, money, politicians. You cant expect justice for dalits in this country.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wonderful, marvelous. Police always are servants of upper caste, money, politicians. You cant expect justice for dalits in this country.
sentences.sCn: 好极了，了不起。警察一直是高种姓、金钱、政客的仆人。达利特在这个国家无法期望得到公正。

synos.tran: 了不起的；非凡的；令人惊异的；不平常的

remMethod.val: “马虎了事” → 马虎做事就没有了不起的成就 → 了不起的

words.tran: 奇迹般地；不可思议地；令人惊讶地

trans.tranCn: 奇迹般的， 了不起的
